name: UnlockEverythingMod
description: Unlocks Ascension 20 for original characters. Unlocks Daily & Custom. Unlocks all relics & cards in STS (excludes mod). Unlocks permission to be able to enter 4th Act. This Mod is almost One-Time-Affective, however usually players need to run game with this mod twice, or wait enough long time (2~3min) on the first time, or it would not unlocks all relics & cards.
